title: Looking for a software developer? You are in the right place!
description: Hi, I'm a Full-Stack developer currently working with Calevala Interactive Ltd. Quoting Albert Einstein: ”Once you stop learning, you start dying”, and that is why I'm committed to staying current with the latest technologies and frameworks. It is my pride and joy to build clean, responsive and scalable web applications. A healthy amount of self-initiative independency and plenty of teamwork is the recipe for creating seamless, high-performing and visually engaging user experiences. I'm looking forward to solving complex problems, executing development efforts and continuously pushing boundaries possibly with you, and to turn innovative ideas into reality together.
